content:
I (Deming Chu, 储德明) am a fresh Ph.D. student at the School of Computer Science and Engineering (CSE), University of New South Wale. My supervisor is Prof. Wenjie Zhang (UNSW) and Prof. Ying Zhang (UTS). Previously, I received my B.Eng. degree from East China Normal University in 2017, and my M.Eng. degree from the same school in 2020 under the supervision of Prof. Xuemin Lin.
I am interested in designing scalable algorithms for massive graphs. During my master’s degree, I worked on Graph Data Management with a focus on Cohesive Subgraph Mining (especially k-core). I will continue to study Graph Data Management in my doctoral career.
